//carry
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   long int n1,n2,num1,num2,i,c,sum=0;
    cin>>n1>>n2;
    do
    {
        c=0;
       num1=n1;
       num2=n2;
       while((num1>0)&&(num2>0))
       {
        sum=(num1%10) +(num2%10);
       if(sum>=10)
       { c++;}
        num1=num1/10;
        num2=num2/10;
       }
       if(c==0)
       cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
       else if(c==1)
       cout<<c<<" carry operation."<<endl;
       else
       cout<<c<<" carry operations."<<endl;
      cin>>n1>>n2;  
    }while((n1>0)&&(n2>0));
    return 0;
}
